Method Detail

getDensityInVPM

java.lang.Double[] getDensityInVPM(int ensemble)
Measured density per vehicle type in veh/meter.

The output array contains measured densities. The array is organized by vehicle type in the order in which they appear in the settings block of the configuration file (see Scenario.getVehicleTypeNames()).

Returns:
Array of densities.

getTotalDensityInVPM

double getTotalDensityInVPM(int ensemble)
Measured total density in veh/meter.

Returns the total density measured by the sensor. Must equal the sum of values in getDensityInVPM(int).

Returns:
A double with the total measured density in veh/meter.

getTotalDensityInVeh

double getTotalDensityInVeh(int ensemble)
Measured total density in veh/link.

Returns the total density measured by the sensor averaged over the links it's in.

Returns:
A double with the total measured density in veh/link.

getOccupancy

double getOccupancy(int ensemble)
Measured total occupancy in a number between 0 and 100.

Returns the occupancy measured by the sensor. *

Returns:
A double with the total occupancy, with values between 0 and 100.

getFlowInVPS

java.lang.Double[] getFlowInVPS(int ensemble)
Measured flow per vehicle type in veh/sec.

The output array contains measured flows. The array is organized by vehicle type in the order in which they appear in the settings block of the configuration file (see Scenario.getVehicleTypeNames()).

Returns:
Array of flows.

getTotalFlowInVPS

double getTotalFlowInVPS(int ensemble)
Measured total flow in veh/sec.

Returns the total flow measured by the sensor. Must equal the sum of values in getFlowInVPS(int).

Returns:
A double with the total measured flow in veh/sec.

getSpeedInMPS

double getSpeedInMPS(int ensemble)
Measured speed in meters/sec.

Returns the speed measured by the sensor.

Returns:
A double with the measured speed in meters/sec.
